sec.title: Special Issue: Assessment in Management Education
sec.p: This special issue of JME will explore specific assessment approaches, methods, and ideas as well as manuscripts that help us think critically about assessment of students, courses, programs, institutions, and even our discipline of management education. We seek manuscripts that share meaningful, appropriate, and creative assessment practices and approaches. We also hope to start a dialogue on ways in which the desire for rigorous assessment and external assessment demands might lead to unintended consequences.
To review the complete call for papers, please visit http://www.sagepub.com/journalsProdAnnounce.nav?prodId=Journal200931.
